website_summaries.verdict: Easy to set up and adjust. Lightweight and highly portable. The polyurethane material is easy to clean down between sessions.
pros: Comfortable yet sturdy with a weight capacity of 300 pounds
The removable sternum pillow is a welcome addition
We love the easily adjustable headrest and armrests, along with the angled adjustable seat
cons: Some users found it cumbersome to put back in its case

customer_reviews.title: ... using it for business but so far it seems comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I just started using it for business but so far it seems comfortable and sturdy. We'll see how it holds up after repeated use. The carrying case that came with it is too small. What's the point of offering a carrying case that the chair doesn't fit into? Giving it 4 stars for now.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Britton

customer_reviews.title: It's nice, just like I knew it would be
customer_reviews.text: Don't dick around and get one of those cheap ass chairs. Just spend a little extra and get quality. I have a Custom Craftworks table and was psyched to get a amazon warehouse deal on this chair. It's nice, just like I knew it would be!!! I am a licensed therapist.
customer_reviews.author: Snakeskins

customer_reviews.title: I love this. Relatively easy to set up and adjust ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Relatively easy to set up and adjust according to the height of the client. I had an issue setting it up for a client who is 6' 4" though, so if you plan on massaging people that are really tall, you might have issues. I'm sure that can be adjusted though and maybe I can figure out how to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works for business!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter, she really loved her chair. Did 3 comfortable massages. Great tool for business!!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Jewel Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! I have had this chair for almost a month and I haven't had a single problem with it. I use this chair twice a week for a total of 8 hours in an office. I work on a variety of people, all different heights and weights. The face cradle is very sturdy and its easy to set up. Super happy with this purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Ledesma

customer_reviews.title: Feel apart after 6 mths ,screw by screw
customer_reviews.text: So upset all screws to keep seat together fell out and lost them in various locations and cant find screws that keep seat in place
customer_reviews.author: justine templeman

customer_reviews.title: Love this massage chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this massage chair. It's the second one I've bought and this one is sturdy and easy to set up. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: good product, except one thing...poor wood product chest piece a]and screws were stripped
customer_reviews.text: Well I love the color and was satisfied with how fast the shipping was; however, the wood is cheaply made and was already drilled into (in other words, the screws were stripped when I got it, this makes it pretty unstable for the chest piece!) Still useable, but not happy that there was some jangling in the package when I got it and figured out why.. Please send a different one.
customer_reviews.author: NoNoNo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality item
customer_reviews.text: Well made and SUPER comfy padding. Clients like the chest pad enhanced padding bar once they try it.
customer_reviews.author: BSupport

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice, so far. Comfortable, easy to set up, sturdy, hardest part is getting back in the bag. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Scrupulous Shopper

product_meta.title: Custom Craftworks Melody Massage Chair
product_meta.description: The Melody massage chair's functional design adjusts at every point to ensure your client's maximum comfort. Weighing in at only 18 pounds, it sets up in seconds and folds for portability. The model includes the carry case, removable sternum pillow plus bonus eyeglass/jewelry pouch.
